Name: Mango
Description: Spanish fashion chain offering trendy womenswear, menswear, and accessories. Has a 'Committed' sustainable capsule line.

Name: Hugo Boss
Description: Two lines: BOSS (refined, premium) and HUGO (younger, edgier). Strong in formalwear, outerwear, and accessories.

Name: Zalando
Description: Europe's largest online fashion platform. Carries hundreds of brands across all price tiers with frequent sales events.

Name: C&A
Description: Affordable everyday basics for the whole family. Wide European presence with over 1,300 stores.

Name: Marks & Spencer
Description: British institution known for reliable quality in clothing and food. Strong in knitwear, workwear, and essentials.

Name: Primark
Description: Ultra-affordable fashion chain. Physical stores only — no online shopping. Great for basics and seasonal pieces.

Name: JD Sports
Description: Leading sportswear and athleisure retailer. Carries Nike, adidas, Jordan, and own-brand lines across Europe.

Name: Galeries Lafayette
Description: Iconic French department store offering luxury, mid-range, and emerging designer brands under one roof.

Name: Kiabi
Description: French affordable family fashion retailer. Budget-friendly with stores across Southern Europe.

Name: Decathlon
Description: World's largest sporting goods retailer. Excellent value for sport-fashion crossover and outdoor clothing.

Name: Reserved
Description: Part of LPP Group. Fast-growing affordable fashion brand from Poland with modern, on-trend collections.

Name: Bestseller
Description: Parent company of Jack & Jones, Vero Moda, ONLY, and SELECTED. Covers casual to smart-casual across price points.

Name: El Corte Inglés
Description: Europe's largest department store group. Carries everything from luxury houses to everyday brands. Famous for seasonal rebajas (sales).

Name: OVS
Description: Italy's largest domestic fashion chain. Ranks #1 in Fashion Transparency Index. Affordable Italian style.

Name: G-Star RAW
Description: Dutch denim brand known for innovative cuts and raw denim. Urban aesthetic with a sustainability push.

Name: Massimo Dutti
Description: Part of Inditex group. Premium casual and formalwear with a polished, understated European aesthetic.

Name: COS
Description: H&M Group subsidiary. Minimalist design, higher quality fabrics. Growing sustainable collections. To evaluate.

Name: ARKET
Description: H&M Group subsidiary. Transparent about factories and materials. Nordic-inspired modern essentials. To evaluate.

Name: & Other Stories
Description: H&M Group subsidiary. Trend-driven with responsible material sourcing. Designed in Paris, Stockholm, and LA. To evaluate.

Name: ARMEDANGELS
Description: GOTS & Fairtrade certified. Known for 'Detox Denim'. One of Europe's leading sustainable fashion labels.

Name: Jan 'n June
Description: Hamburg-based. Transparent supply chain using organic cotton, TENCEL, and recycled materials.

Name: hessnatur
Description: Pioneer in organic textiles since 1976. Natural fibers and timeless designs for the whole family.

Name: LANIUS
Description: Cologne-based minimalist sustainable womenswear. Uses organic, recycled, and innovative eco-materials.

Name: Veja
Description: Iconic sustainable sneaker brand. Uses organic cotton, wild rubber from the Amazon, and recycled materials.

Name: Ekyog
Description: French ethical womenswear label. Focuses on organic and eco-friendly fabrics with feminine designs.
All production within 1,083 km — entirely made in France. Specializes in jeans and sneakers.

Name: Picture Organic Clothing
Description: Outdoor and ski/surf wear made from recycled and organic materials. B Corp certified.

Name: MUD Jeans
Description: Circular denim brand — you can lease jeans, return, and they recycle them into new pairs.

Name: Kuyichi Pure Goods
Description: Sustainable denim and basics. Uses organic cotton and recycled materials since 2001.

Name: Kings of Indigo
Description: Ethical denim brand using organic, recycled, and innovative fibers. Part of the circular fashion movement.

Name: People Tree
Description: Fairtrade fashion pioneer since 1991. Works with artisan groups in developing countries.

Name: Finisterre
Description: Sustainable outdoor and surf wear from Cornwall. Uses recycled ocean waste and organic materials.

Name: Mother of Pearl
Description: London-based sustainable luxury. Transparent supply chain with a focus on responsible sourcing.

Name: Thought
Description: Formerly Braintree. Uses hemp, bamboo, organic cotton, and TENCEL for comfortable everyday wear.

Name: Ecoalf
Description: Makes clothing from recycled ocean waste — fishing nets, plastic bottles, tires. 'Because there is no planet B.'

Name: SKFK
Description: Basque circular fashion brand. Focuses on ethical production and eco-friendly materials.

Name: Thinking MU
Description: Barcelona-based organic and recycled streetwear. Bold prints and relaxed silhouettes.

Name: Nudie Jeans
Description: 100% organic cotton denim. Offers free lifetime repairs at their repair shops across Europe.

Name: ISTO.
Description: Lisbon-based. Transparent pricing, organic materials, and local Portuguese production.

Name: Lucid Collective
Description: Uses recycled materials. Made in Belgian social workshops providing employment to vulnerable communities.

Name: Stella McCartney
Description: Luxury fashion house. No leather, fur, or feathers. Pioneering sustainable luxury since 2001.

Name: EKN
Description: Berlin-based. Sneakers handcrafted by Portuguese artisans using sustainable materials.

Name: Flamingos Life
Description: Vegan sneakers made from recycled materials. Colorful, fun designs with a sustainability mission.

Name: LØCI
Description: Sustainable luxury sneakers using bio-based and recycled materials.

Name: Foot Locker
Description: Biggest sneaker retail chain in Europe. Carries all major sneaker brands and exclusives.

Name: SNS (Sneakersnstuff)
Description: Stockholm-based premium sneaker and streetwear destination. Known for collaborations and limited drops.

Name: Solebox
Description: Berlin-based sneaker boutique with stores in Munich, Amsterdam, Vienna, and Brussels.

Name: Overkill
Description: Berlin sneaker culture since 2003. Curated selection with up to 70% off sales.

Name: Footshop
Description: Central/Eastern Europe focused. Stores in Prague, Bratislava, Budapest, and Bucharest.

Name: Asphaltgold
Description: Darmstadt-based curated sneaker shop. Known for quality picks and exclusive releases.

Name: Footpatrol
Description: London and Paris locations. Specialist in hidden gems, collabs, and limited editions.

Name: Patta
Description: Amsterdam streetwear institution. Own-brand clothing plus curated sneakers and collabs.

Name: size?
Description: Major UK sneaker retailer with exclusive colourways and collaborations.

Name: FOOT DISTRICT
Description: Spanish streetwear and sneaker boutique. Curated selection of premium brands.

Name: One Block Down
Description: Milan and Rome based. Premium streetwear, sneakers, and lifestyle products.

Name: KLEKT
Description: European sneaker marketplace for authentic sneakers. Both new releases and resale.

Name: END. Clothing
Description: Newcastle-based. Over 400 brands from streetwear to luxury. Major online destination for sneakers.

Name: BSTN
Description: Munich-based. Great for sneaker raffles, limited drops, and premium streetwear brands.

Name: Slam Jam
Description: Ferrara-based cultural institution since 1989. First to bring Stussy to Europe. Curated streetwear and collabs.

Name: AFEW
Description: Dusseldorf boutique specializing in curated sneaker collaborations and limited releases.

Name: Naked Copenhagen
Description: World's leading women's sneaker store. Copenhagen-based with curated feminine streetwear.

Name: Titolo
Description: Zurich-based premium sneaker boutique. Known for exclusive releases and Swiss precision curation.

Name: Back-door
Description: Italian streetwear favourite with a loyal following for curated drops and brands.

Name: Norse Store
Description: Copenhagen-based. Scandinavian minimalism meets streetwear. Carries Norse Projects and curated brands.

Name: Rezet Store
Description: Copenhagen sneaker shop with a wide selection of mainstream and limited releases.

Name: Maha Amsterdam
Description: Amsterdam-based women-focused streetwear curation. Unique picks from global and European brands.

Name: Freshcotton
Description: Amsterdam-based streetwear retailer carrying a broad mix of brands and sneakers.

Name: Drip Drops
Description: Dutch retailer focused on limited sneakers — Nike, Jordan, Yeezy, Supreme drops.

Name: Wood Wood
Description: Copenhagen streetwear brand and retail store. Known for graphic design-led collections and collabs.

Name: Sneak
Description: Authentic sneakers with fast EU-wide shipping. Straightforward sneaker retail.

Name: Sneaker District
Description: Antwerp-based sneaker boutique. Curated selection of premium and limited sneaker releases.

Name: Mytheresa
Description: Curated luxury with 250+ brands like Gucci, Prada, Loewe. Major seasonal sales up to 70% off.

Name: NET-A-PORTER
Description: The original luxury fashion e-commerce. Editorial approach to womenswear with excellent sales events.

Name: MR PORTER
Description: NET-A-PORTER's menswear counterpart. Premium fashion, grooming, and lifestyle for men.

Name: THE OUTNET
Description: 350+ luxury brands at permanent discount — previous season stock up to 70% off. Treasure hunting for deals.

Name: YOOX
Description: Off-season designer pieces at deep discounts. Huge catalogue, treasure-hunting vibe for unique finds.

Name: LuisaViaRoma
Description: Florence-based, 600+ brands. Known for generous popup discount codes (40-50% off) and curated luxury.

Name: 24S
Description: LVMH's own online store — exclusive access to Dior, Louis Vuitton, Celine, and other LVMH houses.

Name: SSENSE
Description: Montreal-based but huge in Europe. Bridges luxury and streetwear. Legendary end-of-season sales.

Name: Farfetch
Description: Connects 1,300+ luxury boutiques worldwide into one platform. Buy from independent stores globally.

Name: Acne Studios
Description: Stockholm icon — started with 100 pairs of raw denim, now a global minimalist powerhouse.

Name: Ganni
Description: Copenhagen's most exported brand. Playful Scandinavian style with a massive cult following worldwide.

Name: Norse Projects
Description: Peak minimalism meets streetwear. Quality, simplicity, and everyday functionality from Copenhagen.

Name: Filling Pieces
Description: Amsterdam-based, bridges streetwear and high fashion. Premium sneakers and ready-to-wear.

Name: Our Legacy
Description: Swedish brand redefining contemporary menswear with archival textures, unique silhouettes and fabrics.

Name: Samsoe Samsoe
Description: Danish wardrobe essentials — clean, accessible Scandinavian aesthetic for everyday wear.

Name: Vinted
Description: Europe's #1 resale marketplace with 19% market share. Peer-to-peer selling of pre-owned fashion.

Name: Vestiaire Collective
Description: Luxury resale with authentication service. Find authenticated Hermes, Chanel, and designer pieces.

Name: Depop
Description: Gen-Z focused resale platform. Strong for vintage, Y2K, and streetwear finds.

Name: Beyond Retro
Description: Curated vintage clothing. Physical stores in UK and Nordics plus online shop.

Name: BYBORRE
Description: Not just a brand — a textile innovation studio. Pushes the boundaries of fabric technology and design.
